dialogue.introduction: A brand new Kitakami... that's me, all right. I feel a lot more grown up, loaded to the brim with oxygen torpedoes.
dialogue.library_intro: It's Super Kitakami-sama, equipped with type-93 oxygenated torpedos, with 20 firing tubes on each side. It's been said that I have overpowering strength, but I did not really get any chances to shine. Bah.
dialogue.secretary1: These Type-93 oxygen torpedoes sure are heavy...
dialogue.secretary2: Nuh... What, Admiral...? What is it with you? I don't mind it, though.
dialogue.secretary3: T-that? I'd rather not load any...
dialogue.secretaryidle: You know... My shoulder is getting all stiff. Even though I'm still too young for this~. Torpedoes really are kinda heavy, aren't they?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral? What's up? Feeling down? That's not like you, it's all good.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, I got a bit of a request... that weapon, I don't really want it, yeah?... I'm countin' on ya!
dialogue.show_players_score: A message for you, Admiral. Here.
dialogue.equipment1: Keep em' coming! I'll become an even better ship.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Yeah... 'tis a difficult ship, ain't it.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Yeah... sure is a difficult one. I'll go get fixed in the meanwhile.
dialogue.docking_complete: Repair is done. How bout you take a look.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been floated.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Oh, seems like the fleet returned.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Well, I make the ultimate combination with Ooi.
dialogue.battle_start: 20 shots of Oxygen Torpedoes, going in twice.
dialogue.attack: My 40 firing tubes ain't just for show, 'ya know.
dialogue.night_battle: Time to make oil soup out of you!
dialogue.night_attack: Well, my main cannons are... well... yeah...
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Well, my main cannons are... well... yeah...
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Well, my main cannons are... well... yeah...
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Well, my main cannons are... well... yeah...
dialogue.mvp: Hehe, so this is the power of a torpedo ship. Man... I'm glad I got to do something.
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Guh... I really have no defensive powers...
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Well, how should I say this... I guess these things happen. I wanna get fixed!
dialogue.sunk: I'd like to be a battleship in my next life after all... gulp
dialogue.end_of_year_2014: Phew, it's already the end of the year, gotta do major naval base cleaning... phew~
dialogue.new_year_2015: Hey, isn't this fortunate? I'm counting on you this year too. Don't you just wanna relax, at least during the New Year? Right, Ooicchi?
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Valentine's, huh? Why am I getting chocolate? Is this how it's supposed to go?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Hm? Today is an important day...I forgot about that....Whoa! All these destroyers are gathering around!

hourly.0100: 0100. Yes, that's right. It's the time keeping thing. I'll be doing it for today.
hourly.0200: 0200. I'm gettin' bored of it-. Don't you have things like manga? No manga? ...tch.
hourly.0300: 0300. It's completely late into the night now. I'm sleepy too...
hourly.0400: It's now 0400. Aren't you sleepy, Admiral? I see, isn't that nice...
hourly.0500: 0500. It turned into morning now... It's so bright-... I'm sho sleepy, can I sleep? Starting from right now...
hourly.0600: 0600. Wah! What's wrong, Ooichi? Why're you makin' such a scary face? What's wrong? What's up?
hourly.0700: 0700. Admiral, Ooichi made breakfast. Eh? It's fine, I'm thankful for it.
hourly.0800: 0800. The breakfast that Ooichi made, time to eat! ...Hmm, why is there only portions for two? What about Admiral's?
hourly.0900: 0900. So I keep saying, I'm fine, Ooichi. Go on, go back to your post~. Yes, yes.
hourly.1000: 1000. Fuu... Ooichi has finally gone back. No, she's a good girl, really. Ah, you already knew that? Is that so.
hourly.1100: 1100. After doin' the things on hand, it's already noon huh. Hmm, what should I eat for lunch? Ah, there's still work to do? Right right.
hourly.1200: 1200. It's lunch tiime-! So, what should I eat today? Hmm.
hourly.1300: 1300. That's right, as expected, it's got to be curry for lunch~! Should I go for Mamiya curry? Or should I just take a rest?
hourly.1400: Fuu, in the end, it's always Mamiya-san's curry. Well, that's fine too. It's delicious after all. Ah, it's 1400. Just for the record.
hourly.1500: 1500. Well. Lot'sa things happened. But y'know, that also can't be helped. Is what I'm thinking now.
hourly.1600: 1600. Ah, it's Abukuma. O~i! Hmm? Why did she run away? O~i. ...What a weird person, right?
hourly.1700: It's now 1700. Almost time to finish for the day~ The sun's heading down~
hourly.1800: 1800. Well, 'bout time we close up, yeah? Oh, still too early? I see... tch.
hourly.1900: 1900. Ah, Ooichiii! Why'ya holding a pot? Eh? Ooichi's deluxe curry? C-Curry is it...
hourly.2000: 2000. Hey, Admiral, it is okay to have curry again for dinner? Hmmm. It's pretty good, I'm gettin' chills! Ooicchi, thanks♪
hourly.2100: 2100. Well, we ended up having nothing but curry today, but Ooichi's sure is delicious, yeah? The flavor's a bit strange, though.
hourly.2200: 2200. Well, it's about time for the fleet missions to end for today, yeah? Good work everyone~. Time to sleep, time to sleep. Bye Admiral.
hourly.2300: 2300. ...mm? Mmm~? Ehh.. I'm on night duty today? Eh~? Can I pull it off, doesn't it seem kinda impossible?
